elements.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully

steps.name: user goes to register page
user selects the gender type
user enters first name "automation" and last name "tester"
user enters date of birth
user enters email "test@example.com" field
user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd"
user clicks on register button
A success message will be displayed

name: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts

elements.name: user could login with valid email and password

steps.name: user goes to login page
user logs in with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"
user presses on the login button
user logs in to the system successfully

elements.name: user can't login with invalid email and password

steps.name: user goes to login page
user logs in with "invalid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"
user presses on the login button
user can not login to the system

name: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts

elements.name: users can change the system currency successfully

steps.name: user selects Euro currency from the dropdown list on the top left of home page
Euro Symbol € is shown on the 4 displayed products the in Home page

name: F03_currencies | users can change the system currency

steps.name: user types "laptop" in the search field and clicks search button
The search result for search with "laptop" will be displayed

elements.name: 1-user can add different products to Wishlist

A message that the product was added to the wish list successfully will be displayed

elements.name: 2-user can add different products to Wishlist

steps.name: user searches for a "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" from the home screen

arguments.val: HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop

steps.name: The search result for search will be displayed
The user clicks on the first item to be in the product details page.
The user clicks on add to wishList button
The name of the "HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop" will be added to the wishlist with a quantity more than zero

arguments.val: HTC One M8 Android L 5.0 Lollipop

name: F06_AddToWishList |user can add different products to Wishlist
